p: The aphids used in this study were obtained from a stock culture kept at the Siedlce University of Natural Sciences and Humanities, Poland. A parthenogenetic clone of M. persicae was reared on pea seedlings ( Pisum sativum L.) whereas R. padi was reared on winter wheat ( Triticum aestivum L.). Insect cultures were maintained in controlled environmental chambers at 23 ± 1 °C with 65% relative humidity (RH) and 16:8 h (L:D) photoperiod. Wingless adult parthenogenetic females in the first day of reproduction were selected for all subsequent experiments.
